params.text: This performance measure is measured monthly and data is collected through the normal monthly stipend process. For this reason the Program Associate usually collects and enters this data into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 90%.

panels.title: % of student participants who have received at least 2 contacts per month

params.text: This performance measure is measured monthly and data is collected through the normal monthly stipend process. For this reason the Program Associate usually collects and enters this data into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 4.

This performance measure is measured each grading period (typically 9 weeks).  The Upward Bound Project Director or Counselor will collect this data from either transcripts or Infinite Campus and will then enter the data into a tracking spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 90%.

panels.title: % students participants with a GPA of 2.5+ per 9 weeks

params.text: This performance measure is measured each grading period (typically 9 weeks).  Rather than looking at student achievement, this measure looks at how much did we do? The Upward Bound Project Director or Counselor will keep track of how many students have received an Individual Development Plan counseling session or IDP and then determine the % of participants that have received a session during the grading period in question. The % is then entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 100%.

panels.title: % students receiving an IDP session per 9 weeks

params.text: This performance measure is measured each grading period (typically 9 weeks). The Upward Bound Project Director or Counselor will collect this data from either transcripts or Infinite Campus and will then enter the data into a tracking spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 10%.

panels.title: % student participants with more than 3 absences this 9 week grading period

params.text: This performance measure is measured monthly. The data comes from a monthly KHEAA download. The Associate DIrector of TRiO usually enters this data into ScoreCard.The target for this performance measure is 100%.

panels.title: % senior participants who have completed the FAFSA

params.text: This peformance measure is measured monthly.  The Upward Bound Project Director or Counselor will collect this data from consultation with the student participants and enter it into a spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 100%.

panels.title: % senior participants who have applied to 3 colleges

params.text: This peformance measure is measured monthly.  The Upward Bound Project Director or Counselor will collect this data from consultation with the student participants and enter it into a spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 100%.

This performance measure is measured each grading period (typically 9 weeks).  The Upward Bound Project Director or Counselor will collect this data from either transcripts or Infinite Campus and will then enter the data into a tracking spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 60%.

panels.title: % juniors and seniors who are proficient in reading on ACT

params.text: This performance measure is measured each grading period (typically 9 weeks).  The Upward Bound Project Director or Counselor will collect this data from either transcripts or Infinite Campus and will then enter the data into a tracking spreadsheet.  From the spreadsheet the % is calculated and entered into ScoreCard. The target for this performance measure is 36%.

panels.title: % juniors and seniors who are proficient in math on ACT
